verbose_text: ATPase activities of Hsp104 and Hsp104 DWB (0.5 muM monomer) were determined at 22degreesC in 25 mM HEPES pH 7.5, 150 mM potassium acetate, 10 mM magnesium acetate, 10 mM DTT, and 2 mM ATP without and with k-casein by measuring the amount of inorganic phosphate released after 15 min using the malachite green assay.
